## OmvFeatureModifier.doProcessPolygonFeature() method

Check if the polygon feature described by `env` should be processed. The properties can be modified or added to.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
doProcessPolygonFeature(layer: string, env: MapEnv, level: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  layer | string | Current layer. |
|  env | [MapEnv](./harp-datasource-protocol.mapenv.md) | Properties of polygon feature. |
|  level | number | Level of tile. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`false` to ignore feature.
